```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
```

## Top companies

```{r}
complaints <- readRDS("C:/Users/madel/OneDrive/Reporting in the Digital Age/github_repositories/CFPBcomplaints/complaints.rds")

complaints %>%
  group_by(company) %>%
  summarise(total = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(total))

```
## Top products

```{r}
complaints %>%
  group_by(product) %>%
  summarise(total = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(total))

```
